/**
Coded by:-   Himanshu (RogueH)
**/
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
#include <utility>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstdio>
#include <queue>
#include <sstream>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <bitset>

#define LL long long int
#define SF second.first
#define SS second.second
#define mP make_pair
#define pB push_back
#define F first
#define S second

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	LL n,k,i,cnt,cases;
	string str;
	bool f;
	cin>>cases;
	while(cases--)
	{
		cin>>n>>k;
		vector<LL> vec(n,0);
		f=false;
		cin>>str;
		for(i=1,cnt=1; i<str.size(); i++)
		{
			if(str[i]==str[i-1])
				cnt++;
			else
			{
				vec.pB(cnt);
				cnt=1;
			}
		}
		vec.pB(cnt);
		for(i=0; i<vec.size(); i++)
		{
			if(vec[i]>=k)
			{
				f=true;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(!f)
		{
			cout<<-1<<endl;
		}
		else
		{
			cnt=0;
			for(i=0; i<vec.size(); i++)
			{
				cnt+=vec[i]/k + (vec[i]%k==0?0:1);
			}
			cout<<cnt<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
